general.gigTitle: design and develop a wordpress website for you

sellerCard.description:
</ Web Design and Development >
Responsive or direct Mobile First?

When designing your website, you must always pay attention to the needs of your customers.
You are spoiled for choice when it comes to digitizing your business. 
I can help you choose the combination of services and usability that best suits your goals. 

Web development â€“
WordPress, WooCommerce is where I thrive and can help you the most.

If you want to have a presence on the Internet, the website is your first and best choice.

No compromise on quality!!!

description.content:
Join the World Wide Web and position your business online with beautiful vision, modern design, and quality craftsmanship.


I started learning about HTML & CSS in my early teen years then my hobby became my education ( I studied Computer Science in Berlin, Germany ) and now Web Design and Development is my full-time job.


Before approaching the digital world, you need to set clear goals.

WordPress is a free, open-source website creation platform. On a more technical level, WordPress is a content management system (CMS) written in PHP that uses a MySQL database.

In non-geek speak, WordPress is the easiest and most powerful blogging and website builder in existence today.

WordPress is an excellent website platform for a variety of websites:


  • From blogging
  • to e-commerce
  • to business
  • to portfolio websites



Thanks to my extensive experience and market knowledge, I know how to target every audience group at any given time in order to get the most out of advertising campaigns and help you build a reputation and online presence.

slide.name: design and develop a wordpress website for you
design and develop a wordpress website for you
design and develop a wordpress website for you

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you design and develop?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes,  I can help you with both processes: designing your new online presence and then develop it into code.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you improove existing design or do you need to start from scratch?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Well depending on the stage and quality of the existing projects we can either improve and correct or suggest a brand new vision and design.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help me with SEO?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, improving your ratings in Search Engines is a major part of our work and we can help you with it as well.

reviews.comment: Totally recommend. Top communication and delivery.

Very happy with my new site. Did not need to micro manage and am so
Happy to find someone who knew what I wanted. Perfect communication will definitely use again.

Alexander is a great communicator, who took the time to educate us about our design flaws, resulting not only in a great page but also in better e-commerce experience for our users.
Fast and reliable, an absolut expert.
